name: Tower Hell (G̸l̸i̷t̴c̶h̸e̵d̵ ̷J̶s̵o̷n̴)
description:
Tower Hell - Combining clasic tower defense and bullet hell games into one

Test your skill by beating your own high score in this challenging bullet hell game, where the patterns created are by your own hand.

This game was made for the Bullet Hell Game Jam (2021) with the limitation [10 seconds]. Each round lasts exactly that long, and in between each round you get to choose a tower to place, modifier for all future bullets spawned, or dangerous hazard that will appear during each round.

This is the second ever game I am making from scratch. I've participated in many game jams using game maker, but recently got into learning java and wanted to test my knowledge, which is the reason why I joined this jam 3 days late.
